IMAGE: Jemimah Rodrigues moves up from Category C to Category B in the central contracts of the BCCI. Photograph: Mike Hewitt/Getty Images

articles.author: REDIFF CRICKET
articles.title: Sachin Says He's Not 50! - Rediff.com
articles.description: 'I'm a 25 year old with 25 years of experience.'
articles.content:
Sachin Tendulkar, who turned 50 on Monday, April 24, took time out to thank his fans for their birthday greetings.
